name: Verify search by ID functionality in Primary Goals filter modal
description: Validates that users can search for goals using their ID in the Primary Goals filter modal and that results are displayed correctly
preconditions: User is logged in and has access to Overall Analytics with multiple Primary Goals configured that have visible IDs

test_case_steps.step: Navigate to Overall Analytics page
test_case_steps.result: Overall Analytics dashboard loads successfully

test_case_steps.step: Click on Primary Goals filter to open the child filter modal
test_case_steps.result: Primary Goals modal opens displaying list of goals with their IDs and names

test_case_steps.step: Note the ID of a specific goal from the list (e.g., 'GOAL-12345')
test_case_steps.result: Goal ID is visible in the list

test_case_steps.step: Enter the complete goal ID in the search bar
test_case_steps.result: Search filters the list and displays only the goal matching the entered ID

test_case_steps.step: Clear search and enter a partial ID (e.g., first few characters '1234')
test_case_steps.result: Search displays all goals whose IDs contain the partial string

test_case_steps.step: Select the goal from search results and apply
test_case_steps.result: Modal closes and selected goal is applied as Primary Goal filter in Overall Analytics

name: Test search by ID functionality in Secondary Goals filter modal
description: Ensures that ID-based search works correctly in Secondary Goals filter modal with same behavior as Primary Goals
preconditions: User has access to Overall Analytics with multiple Secondary Goals configured

test_case_steps.step: Navigate to Overall Analytics page
test_case_steps.result: Page loads successfully

test_case_steps.step: Open Secondary Goals filter modal
test_case_steps.result: Secondary Goals modal displays with goals showing both IDs and names

test_case_steps.step: Enter a goal ID in the search bar
test_case_steps.result: List filters to show only goals matching the searched ID

test_case_steps.step: Verify that search is case-insensitive by entering ID in different case
test_case_steps.result: Search returns correct results regardless of case used

test_case_steps.step: Enter an ID that does not exist in the system
test_case_steps.result: Empty state is displayed with appropriate message indicating no matching goals found

test_case_steps.step: Clear search to return to full list
test_case_steps.result: All available Secondary Goals are displayed again

name: Validate combined search by name and ID in child filter modals
description: Tests that search functionality works for both name and ID simultaneously, and correctly prioritizes or combines results
preconditions: Goals with distinct IDs and names are available in the system

test_case_steps.step: Open Primary Goals or Secondary Goals filter modal
test_case_steps.result: Modal opens with full list of goals

test_case_steps.step: Search for a goal by its name
test_case_steps.result: Goals matching the name appear in filtered results

test_case_steps.step: Clear search and search for the same goal by its ID
test_case_steps.result: The same goal appears when searching by ID

test_case_steps.step: Search using a string that matches part of an ID and part of another goal's name
test_case_steps.result: All goals matching either the ID portion or name portion are displayed

test_case_steps.step: Enter special characters or numbers that might appear in IDs
test_case_steps.result: Search handles special characters correctly and returns accurate results

test_case_steps.step: Verify list updates in real-time as user types
test_case_steps.result: Search results dynamically update with each keystroke without delay

name: Test ID search performance and behavior with large datasets
description: Ensures that ID search functionality performs efficiently when dealing with large numbers of goals and handles edge cases
preconditions: System has 100+ goals configured to test performance

test_case_steps.step: Open child filter modal (Primary or Secondary Goals) with large dataset
test_case_steps.result: Modal opens and displays goals with pagination or scrolling if applicable

test_case_steps.step: Measure time to search by ID in large list
test_case_steps.result: Search completes in under 1 second and results appear without lag

test_case_steps.step: Search for an ID that appears at the end of the list
test_case_steps.result: Goal is found and displayed correctly regardless of position in full list

test_case_steps.step: Rapidly type and delete search terms to test debouncing
test_case_steps.result: Search handles rapid input changes smoothly without errors or UI freezing

test_case_steps.step: Enter very long ID strings or unusual patterns
test_case_steps.result: Search handles edge cases gracefully with appropriate feedback

test_case_steps.step: Select multiple goals after ID search and verify selection persists
test_case_steps.result: Selected goals are correctly applied when modal is closed

name: Verify ID search consistency across all child filter modals
description: Validates that ID search functionality is implemented consistently across all child filter modals in Overall Analytics
preconditions: Access to multiple child filter modals including Goals, Campaigns, or other filterable entities with IDs

test_case_steps.step: Identify all child filter modals in Overall Analytics that display IDs
test_case_steps.result: List of modals includes Primary Goals, Secondary Goals, and any other applicable filters

test_case_steps.step: Open each modal and verify IDs are visible in the item list
test_case_steps.result: All modals display IDs alongside names consistently

test_case_steps.step: Test ID search functionality in each modal
test_case_steps.result: ID search works in all modals with consistent behavior

test_case_steps.step: Compare search behavior across modals for consistency (case sensitivity, partial match, etc.)
test_case_steps.result: All modals exhibit identical search behavior and user experience

test_case_steps.step: Verify search placeholder text mentions both name and ID search capability
test_case_steps.result: Placeholder text in search bar indicates users can search by name or ID

test_case_steps.step: Test keyboard navigation and accessibility in ID search across modals
test_case_steps.result: Search is accessible via keyboard and screen readers in all modals
